alert.note: Alert for Logan; Simpson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 11:25PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Logan and Simpson Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1025 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Russellville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Logan and Simpson Counties, including the following locations... Adairville, Salmons, Neosheo, Schochoh, Middleton, Schweizer, Prices Mill, Schley and Peden Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
